name: 3d Simulator Sniper: Shooting
description:
3d Simulator sniper shooting is a game in which you have the role of the arrow.
In the game you have to go the way of the arrow. Imagine that you have chosen to nature that would shoot at targets with different weapons. Feel the realism of the shooting will help ballistics bullet and effects shots.
For the player represented sniper rifles of different classes. Get experience and money, aim more accurate, since each level of complexity of the game increases.
